thread.section_title: SimplyEyeglasses.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SimplyEyeglasses.com | www.simplyeyeglasses.com
thread.title: Erica Steber

author: Erica Steber
title: Erica Steber
text: Just got my Gx by Gwen Stefani glasses today! I was a little nervous about ordering glasses online because whenever I buy them local they always have a hard time making the lenses and usually end up sending them back to be redone. But no one around here sells the Gwen Stefani frames so I gave it a shot. I took them right out of the box and put them on and everything is perfect! Great customer service. Highly recommended :)
